description:
Koke-hime is one of the land gods. She wears a Heian-style kimono and usually stays in her shrine. Koke-hime was almost cursed by http://anidb.net/ch23226 [Sodemogi] but saved by http://anidb.net/ch19468 [Kurotabou].
400 years ago, Kokehime was a human, but because of her power that made her tears into pearls, she was targeted by Hagoromo Gitsune. After being saved by the http://anidb.net/ch37514 [Nura Clan], she moved to Edo. She was shown to be attached to http://anidb.net/ch20583 [Hitotsume Nyudou] after the defeat of Hagorome Gitsune 400 years ago. Afterwards she was worshiped by the people and became a land god.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Koke-hime
